body:
PR description:

Correction for cassettes and partial wafers for v17 version of HGCal geometry. 

PR validation:

Tested using overlap checking tool and fireworks for V17 versions of HGCal geometry

if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Corrections for HGCal v17 geometry
